name: ANGEL AZIMUTH
description:
Control ANGEL with WASD (or ZQSD)

Control AZIMUTH with your MOUSE

Destroy ENEMY VESSELS

Grab SCRAP with AZIMUTH

Bring it back to ANGEL to UPGRADE

SURVIVE

Created for TriJam #166 in 4 hours, the first of which was spent re-remembering how to program 2D movement
